## ICollapsibleToolboxItem interface

Interface for an item in the toolbox that can be collapsed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ICollapsibleToolboxItem extends ISelectableToolboxItem 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem_interface.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getChildToolboxItems()](./blockly.icollapsibletoolboxitem_interface.getchildtoolboxitems_1_methodsignature.md) | Gets any children toolbox items. (ex. Gets the subcategories) |
|  [isExpanded()](./blockly.icollapsibletoolboxitem_interface.isexpanded_1_methodsignature.md) | Whether the toolbox item is expanded to show its child subcategories. |
|  [toggleExpanded()](./blockly.icollapsibletoolboxitem_interface.toggleexpanded_1_methodsignature.md) | Toggles whether or not the toolbox item is expanded. |
